attributes.action: Give White South Africans refugee status to the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Since the ANC took over SA, over 70,000 white South Africans have been murdered and untold numbers more have been robbed, raped and tortured. 

This act will be the final nail in the coffin if nothing is done for White South Africans, they will be killed, tortured or left to starve as they will have no livelihood. They are genuine refugees who need help from the UK.
attributes.background:
On 27/2/18, The National Assembly has voted in favour of amending the South African constitution to allow the government to expropriate land without compensation.

After recent aggression towards the White South African people, it is time the UK did their part and gave them refuge. They need it.

rejection.details:
People can already claim asylum if they have left their country and are unable to go back because they fear persecution.

You can find out more:

https://www.gov.uk/claim-asylum
